name: currently-airing-anime
description: Get currently airing anime shows via a simple API

scripts.build: tsc && rollup ./lib/currentlyAiringAnime.js --format umd --name currentlyAiringAnime --output ./lib/currentlyAiringAnime.umd.js && rollup ./lib/currentlyAiringAnime.js --format cjs --output ./lib/currentlyAiringAnime.commonjs.js

author: Rick Lancee <https://github.com/ricklancee/>
